prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a round body and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a cute, blue Pokemon that loves to float and play in the water.
Design a small, bubbly Pokemon that has a big smile and a balloon tail.
Generate a Pokemon that is friendly, aquatic, and has a vibrant blue color scheme.
Show me a playful Pokemon with large ears and a cheerful personality!
Make a tiny Pokemon that enjoys living near water and has a round shape.
I want a Pokemon with a balloon feature and a joyful expression.
